[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ResolverBuilder](../fast-element.resolverbuilder/index.html)

## ResolverBuilder class

A utility class used that constructs and registers resolvers for a dependency injection container. Supports a standard set of object lifetimes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResolverBuilder<K> 
```

</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[aliasTo(destinationKey)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.aliasto/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Aliases the current key to a different key.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[cachedCallback(value)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.cachedcallback/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a resolver that invokes a callback function the first time that a dependency resolution is requested. The returned value is then cached and provided for all subsequent requests.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[callback(value)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.callback/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a resolver that invokes a callback function for every dependency resolution request, allowing custom logic to return the dependency.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[instance(value)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.instance/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a resolver for an existing object instance.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[singleton(value)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.singleton/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a resolver that enforces a singleton lifetime.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[transient(value)](../fast-element.resolverbuilder.transient/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Creates a resolver that creates a new instance for every dependency request.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
